name: claude-agent-sdk-skills
description: Expert guidance for building AI agents with the Claude Agent SDK

plugins.name: claude-agent-sdk-python
plugins.description: Expert guidance for building AI agents with the Claude Agent SDK in Python. Covers query(), ClaudeSDKClient, ClaudeAgentOptions, custom @tool functions, subagents, hooks, MCP integration, sessions, and production best practices.

plugins.name: claude-agent-sdk-typescript
plugins.description: Expert guidance for building AI agents with the Claude Agent SDK in TypeScript. Covers query(), ClaudeSDKClient, allowedTools, custom tools with createSdkMcpServer, subagents, hooks, MCP integration, sessions, and production best practices.
